title: The Top 100 Players
overview: The NFL Network annually goes in-depth to discuss The Top 100 Players of the year as selected by the players themselves. Once again, the NFL Network will be counting down the league's best footballers on The Top 100 Players broadcast weekly on Mondays at 8 p.m. ET. Last season, the then-MVP and Panthers quarterback Cam Newton took the top prize as the #1 overall best Football player in the league as voted on by the players themselves. But one year later, the league's hierarchy has changed dramatically so who will be voted #1 in 2021?
